name: VictimsOfIntolerance
description: Hate crimes monitor for political motivated assaults in Brazil.

SDGs.evidenceText: This project is an effort to reunite reported cases of victims of political violence, motivated by political intolerance. There is a crescent number of attacks being reported in the electoral context,  so mapping this cases is a form to show the advance of intolerance in the country.
